author: Zapp_Brannigan
title: Okay
review: I got this set way back in '02 and liked it back then. Then it got boring, as there are only 2 players per team (not including goalies). The flaming soccer ball is nice and so are the goalies' abilities to move up, down, and side to side. Includes 2 nets, spring action platforms for kicking the ball, side boards with advertisements, and 2 VERY useful 8x16 bricks that are a great start to building large skyscrapers. Overall so-so set and forgot what the price was.
